name: Just a Regular Game of Cards
name_original: Just a Regular Game of Cards
description:
Howdy there partner! Wanna play a game of cards? 

This is our incomplete yet hopefully fun and entertaining card game made for the B&W Jam. We were unable to complete and add in one of the main ideas for the game so this may be something we revisit at some point in the future. 

Nonetheless, be sure give it a crack partner! Read the darn newspaper, eat your roast chicken, say farewell to the loving wife and be sure to have some tolerance for those damned bugs crawling around these parts when heading out to play some cards! 

Developers

  • Jordan Seaward
  • Luke Anderson

Unique Rules

  • Select Mastercard: Upon reaching the last round of turns you can select a card to be your "Mastercard" before the results are calculated. When selected, this card will double the value of all cards in your hand and on the table that belong to the same Suit (Icon).
  • Discard Card: Upon reaching the 2nd round of turns, you can select a card to be discarded. This means that card is set onto the table and you get to draw a new random card.

<Folding may or may not consistently bug out the game resulting in the game not progressing, so probably avoid using it.>
